references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to federated learning, introducing the communication-efficient learning framework that many subsequent works build upon.
This paper is highly influential in addressing the challenges of non-IID data in federated learning, proposing key techniques for improving robustness and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Federated learning on non-iid data silos: An experimental study
references.reason: This paper offers a comprehensive experimental evaluation of federated learning under various non-IID settings, providing valuable insights and benchmarks for the field.
This paper is among the earliest to systematically address the non-IID data challenges in federated learning, highlighting their significant impact on model performance and convergence.

references.paper_title: Federated learning based on dynamic regularization
references.reason: This paper provides a novel approach to address the heterogeneity challenge via dynamic regularization, enhancing the robustness and convergence of federated learning algorithms.
